entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 1.
